properties.areaDesc: St Joseph to South Haven MI; South Haven to Holland MI; Holland to Grand Haven MI
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 4 at 3:31PM EST until January 6 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the small craft advisory, expect northwest winds
gusting to 30 knots and waves up to 5 feet into the evening. For
the Gale Warning, southwest to west winds of 20 to 25 knots with
gusts to 35 knots early Sunday afternoon will turn northwest and
increase to 20 to 30 knots with gusts to 40 knot gales during
the late afternoon and evening. Waves will build between 7 and
11 feet.

* WHERE...St Joseph to Grand Haven.

* WHEN...The Small Craft Advisory continues until 10 PM EST this
evening. The Gale Warning is in effect from 1 PM Sunday to 5 AM Monday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A Lakeshore Flood Advisory is also in
effect Sunday afternoon through Monday afternoon. Lakeshore
flooding in addition to beach and dune erosion is expected.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM SUNDAY TO 5 AM EST MONDAY
